original_title: UFC on FX 4: Maynard vs. Guida
overview: UFC on FX 4: Maynard vs. Guida was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship on June 22, 2012 in Revel Casino in Atlantic City, New Jersey. The main event consists of a five-round, non-championship, bout between Clay Guida and Gray Maynard.
title: UFC on FX 4: Maynard vs. Guida
